title: Number of missing persons files in the U.S. by race 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
The maximum Number of missing persons 359768.0 is found at Race White and the minimum is found at Indian where Number of missing persons is 10447.0.
The maximum Race White has got 34.44 times higher Number of missing persons than the minimum Race Indian.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of missing persons for 5 number of Races.
The Number of missing persons is highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
The maximum Number of missing persons 359768.0 is found at Race White and the minimum is found at Indian where Number of missing persons is 10447.0.
The maximum Race White has got 34.44 times higher Number of missing persons than the minimum Race Indian.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Race, and Number of missing persons in each Race on the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
Race  has the second highest value for Number of missing persons.
The minimum Race Indian has got 34.44 times less Number of missing persons than the maximum Race White.
Number of missing persons at Race White is 359768.0 , second place is  at 359768.0, and thirdly is Unknown at 20587.0.
The Race White has 2.95 times more Number of missing persons than average.
